plot outline: Paapi Chirayu is the tale of two orphans, Ramu and Priya, both of who are orphans. After meeting under unexpected circumstances, Ramu falls in love with Priya, but knows that he has to give up rag-picking and take up a better job to lead a comfortable life with her. Everything seems hunky-dory for the couple, until they are suspected to be involved in a murder. Can they prove their innocence and lead a happy life?
title: Paapi Chirayu
plot: When a young couple get caught on the wrong side of the law. Can they find their way out?

_Paapi Chirayu_ (qv) is the tale of two orphans, Ramu and Priya, both of who are orphans. After meeting under unexpected circumstances, Ramu falls in love with Priya, but knows that he has to give up rag-picking and take up a better job to lead a comfortable life with her. Everything seems hunky-dory for the couple, until they are suspected to be involved in a murder. Can they prove their innocence and lead a happy life?::Vinay Lokesh
